meanings.definition: (医学)過剰排卵：卵巣が通常よりも多くの卵子を放出する状態。
meanings.english_definition: (Medicine) A condition in which the ovaries release more than the usual number of eggs.

examples.sentence: Hyperovaria can be a side effect of fertility treatments.
examples.translation: 過剰排卵は不妊治療の副作用となることがある。

collocations: fertility treatment-induced hyperovaria (不妊治療誘発性過剰排卵)
